question: [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/manage.move] [Function: deposit_incentive_v3_reward_fund()] [Balance Mismatch] If deposit_coin value < amount due to race condition, can the split at line 107 fail, causing DoS? (Medium)
